activities: We conduct pre-employment background checks. We need the personal data in order to verify employment, education, credit and to ensure they have not been a part of any criminal activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data whether manually processed or otherwise inputted or received including but not limited to: social security number, drivers license number, addresses, degrees or certifications, etc...
privacyprograms: Self regulatory privacy program designed to safeguard all personally identifiable information which adheres to Safe Harbor Principles.
recoursemech: Our dispute resolution process complete with web site available form and or contact via a toll free number allows for timely and successful resolution of any disputes.  We follow FTC/FCRA guidelines for all such resolution of disputes. We agree to cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
